Detailed Description

This class represents a SpotLight.

As well as having a position, this light also has a direction, cutoff and exponent. Can be used as an OpenGL spotlight.

See also:
Light
LightBulb
Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SpotLight::SpotLight (  ) [inline]

Default constructor for SpotLight.

Initialises variables to default. Facing into the screen, angle 40.0 and focus 30.0
